div.head: 溺水死
div.div: , [appearance of] death from drowning in water

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: , [appearance of] death from drowning in water

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with ni si 溺死 , [appearance of] death from drowning. Pu ji fang 普濟方 255: 治溺水死者，上臥倒瀝却水 , 便於肚上多著灰掩之，仍以皂莢末吹鼻中， 即活 , “To cure cases of [appearance of] death from drowning in water , let that person lie with his upper body inclined downwards to have the water flow off.Then have his abdomen covered with ashes. In addition blow a zao jia powder into his nose. This will bring him back to life”.
